description.zh-CN: Biophilic Design 是亲生物设计风格，适合健康、环保和生活方式类应用。将自然元素融入数字界面，使用绿色调、有机形状、流动曲线和自然纹理，营造.生物亲合设计风格适合健康和生活方式。融合自然元素促进健康和环保意识。
description.en-US: Biophilic Design style is suitable for health, environmental, and lifestyle creating immersive and engaging digital experiences through thoughtful design principles, modern aesthetics, and user-centered approach to interface creating immersive and engaging digital experiences through thoughtful design principles, modern aesthetics, and user-centered approach to interface development This design approach offers a distinctive visual language suitable for modern applications. It combines aesthetic principles with functional design elements to create compelling user experiences. natural elements promoting wellness and environmental consciousness. Excellence in design.
